name: Jump Slime
description:
Are you looking for a real challenge? Do you want to put your patience to the test? Find your way to the top in this difficult platformer. Incarnate a cute slime on his path to the glory.

With the objective of bringing the "rage-climbing platforming" genre to a more simple and portable approach, Jump Slime combines various mechanics to keep the difficulty up and glorious.

Developer's Note

This summer project was designed to torture a couple of my friends and ended up being a cool prototype that I am very proud of. The game will be published here and on the Play Store so any pain addict can play until the headache appears.

Game Made by:  @AppsFrisk
